Reviews.Title: Great way to streamline video camera installations
Reviews.Author: Kim Paynter
Reviews.Content: Very straight forward and simple to use. Makes installations much easier to do by including the power supply required by my video cameras. The setup is pretty easy to understand.

Reviews.Title: Great item, awesome customer service!
Reviews.Author: Chad Wahls
Reviews.Content: This works PERFECTLY and takes a lot of the trouble out of installing a multi-camera setup via a wired (more reliable) connection.I must also commend the seller at this point.  When the package arrived an important item was missing from the box. Hey humans make mistakes, it seems as they pack per order, which is pretty cool.  I called the vendor directly and they answered the phone immediately (Hooray a real person!)  They were very understanding and apologetic and within a day or two, via expedited shipping, I had the item i needed to complete the order.  It really puts faith in humanity to come across service like this.  These are great people and I will MOST CERTAINLY order from them again when I decide to expand my setup to more cameras (adding a larger power supply to support more.)

Reviews.Title: eh...
Reviews.Author: T-hay "T Man"
Reviews.Content: The power fails when 3 cameras are plugged up. Wish it could handle a bigger load on the little switch...

Reviews.Title: Works Well for my FOS CAMs
Reviews.Author: Techno Geek Guru "Dave"
Reviews.Content: This works well for the FOS Cameras I have mounted on my house. I had no problems running cameras well over 100ft from the power outlet. I would have given it a 5 star but the Ethernet to power adaptors are rather large and bulky to have hanging on the outside of a house.

ProductInfo.Features:
kit of 4x 5 volt 2 amp 10 watt Power over Ethernet PoE splitters for Cameras up to 328ft via Ethernet cable
24v 30 watt supply and 8 port injector
for Foscam, Wansview, Airsight, EasyN, Apexis, Wanscam and other 5v devices
Can also be used for remote USB power with optional adapters.   Click on WiFi-Texas to visit the Amazon Store
Expert, USA Tech support - ask if you have any questions call 512 479 0317
ProductInfo.Name: WS-POE-5v-4x 5 volt Remote Power - PoE kit for 4 cameras with 5 volt 2 amps each
